| History                 = The Ramone Cartel was the major source of cocaine coming out of [[San Domingo]]. It consisted of a number of drug families, of which the [[Ramone Family (Earth-616)|Ramone Drug Family]] was the most powerful. Only they had the connections to sell the cocaine in [[Miami]]. The military junta that ruled San Domingo were for all intents and purposes the cartel's partners.{{r|Punisher Bloodlines Vol 1 1}}
